text: Evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ yena kesamuttaṃ nāma kālāmānaṃ nigamo tadavasari
edit: Evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ yena kesamuttaṃ nāma kālāmānaṃ nigamo tadavasari

translations.transtext: It is heard by me thus, in one occasion the Blessed One, traveling in Kosala together with a big group of monks, [by] which town of the K\=al\=amas named Kesamutta [is located], he arrived there.
